## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4499ba2c16cf02f2e12c45bba95e21bd588726f331f7a7a7f8eecfbb0369cafc)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@fraudprevention/device-intelligence' @ 100.99.100 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
